title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-9.1 - Application of this subpart
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-9.1 - Application of this subpart

State Regulations

Except as otherwise specifically provided, the provisions
of this Subpart apply to all gas-fired boilers without regard to date of
installation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-9.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
